channel.title: CVE Feed for IBM -- Sterling Control Center
channel.description: The latest CVEs for IBM -- Sterling Control Center

item.title: CVE-2023-35020|2024-10-21T11:36:55.718Z -- ibm -- sterling%20control%20center
item.description: IBM Sterling Control Center 6.3.0 could allow a remote attacker to traverse directories on the system. An attacker could send a specially crafted URL request containing "dot dot" sequences (/../) to view arbitrary files on the system. IBM X-Force ID: 257874.
